messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Ok, I started it!
messages.msgSnippet: That would be awesome!  I d love to have other voices reading their own words as well!! :) ~Q~ aka Sarah http://www.unbridledlearning.com ... From:
messages.messageBody:
That would be awesome! I'd love to have other voices reading their own
words as well!! :)

~Q~
aka Sarah
http://www.unbridledlearning.com
-----Original Message-----
From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Ren Allen
Sent: Sunday, April 30, 2006 10:42 AM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Ok, I started it!

Very cool Queanna!! Thanks so much for doing this....what a great
medium, if only I could figure it out. Soon perhaps!

Everyone should go listen to her podcast, it was really cool to hear a
voice connected to the information. Maybe some of us could forward our
own voices recorded to make it really unique? I don't have a way to
record yet, but I'm sure Trevor could help out.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
